attributes.action: Expadite approval and construction of a Train Sation at the RICOH arena in Coventry
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The undersigned request that the plans to construct a train station at the RICOH arena in Coventry be both approved and the approval and construction of this station be fast tracked. Plans for the station have been made, funding is in place and it has been included as a priority on the regional development plan. Their is a daily demand for a train service as well as for special events concerts, exhibitions held at the stadium. its provision will reduce the number of car journeys made to attend these events.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Expadite approval and construction of a Train Sation at the RICOH arena in Coventry."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page22992


Prime Minister's Office
